item.title: Getting Started
item.description: How to install Get the app up and running by following our AWS deployment guide. After following these steps watch this guide to set up the keys you’ll need for sending emails. Want to test the app on your own machine? Check out our local deployment guide. Troubleshooting We’re keen to tackle any issues people encounter. If you experience any problems, please create an issue and we’ll get back to you.
